DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effect inhaled tiotropium bromide trough FEV1 assess cardiac effect 12-lead Holter ECG monitoring patient COPD .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety ( Including 24-hour Holter Monitoring ) Tiotropium Inhalation Capsules Patients With COPD
DOC.criteria: History COPD , FEV1 le equal 65 % , FEV1/FVC le equal 70 % Smoking history great equal 10 pack year Not history clinical diagnosis asthma and/or atopy A history thoracotomy pulmonary resection Patients require use supplemental oxygen therapy > 12 hour per day Chronic use systemic corticosteroid unstable daily dose Patients recent history myocardial infarction A know hypersensitivity anticholinergic drug
